page.title: 06FARMING (CONTINUED)
page.content: The biggest farm in our area is Hall Farm in Stanwick.It has 650 acres of land of which are used for growing 200 acres of corn,120 acres of wheat,70 acres of barley and 10 acres of oats.The farmer also owns 85 milk cows and 325 beef cattle.Many farms in the area use the majority of their land to grow oil seed rape. Scalley farm is an arable farm.The farmer has been farming for 30 years.He owns 408 acres.He owns 278 acres of wheat,80 acres of oil seed rape and 50 acres of grass.On the grass he farms table poultry. Hillstone farm is a mixed farm.The farmer has been farming for 15 years.They own 300 acres of land.On that land he grows 130 acres of wheat,80 acres of barley and 40 acres of oil seed rape.They also have 18 sows and 1 boar.
